name: Bashir Abubakar
description: Bashir Abubakar is a Mental Health Data Analyst specialising in applied AI, natural language processing, predictive modelling and healthcare innovation. He works across NHS services to improve urgent and emergency care, analyse patient pathways and support data-driven decision making. His work integrates responsible AI, global health, and sustainability, reflecting his experience as a delegate at COP28 and One Young World Ambassador.
